full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON PO TSE YI BDAG PO'I TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA KUN BZANG DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA MGON PO GNYIS LA'ANG SBYAR CHOG PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES MGON PO TSE'I BDAG PO'I TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA KUN BZANG DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DUR BED @005A *, ,WANG GI HO SHO NAS DAD LDAN DON GRUB KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, RIG PA 'DZIN PA GZUGS BRNYAN ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS AA LAG SHA CHEN WANG DBANG CHEN DPAL 'BAR GYI MKHAR NANG GI BSTI GNAS SU MGYOGS PAR SBYAR BA'O, ,)
